regionPicker.title: Choose your preferred region
regionPicker.description: We will store your data in the region you choose to provide you with lower latency and better performance by reducing the distance between you and our backend services. You cannot change this later.

eu-west-3.name: Paris
eu-west-3.description: Best if you are in Western Europe

eu-central-1.name: Frankfurt
eu-central-1.description: Best if you are in Central Europe

us-east-1.name: N. Virginia
us-east-1.description: Best if you are in Eastern US

us-west-2.name: Oregon
us-west-2.description: Best if you are in Western US

promos.title: Promo Campaigns
promos.description: Manage your promotional campaigns and track their performance
promos.noPromosDescription: Create your first promotional campaign to get started

promoDetails.title: Promo Details
promoDetails.campaignLinksDescription: Copy these links to track traffic from different social media platforms

createPromo.title: Create New Promo
createPromo.description: Design your promotional campaign to engage customers

shops.title: My Shops
shops.description: Select a shop to manage your promotional campaigns

createShop.title: Create New Shop
createShop.description: Set up your shop to start managing promotional campaigns

statistics.title: Analytics Dashboard
statistics.description: Track your promotional campaigns performance and customer engagement
statistics.keyMetrics: Key performance metrics for your shop
statistics.detailedAnalytics: Detailed analytics for each promotional campaign

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account preferences and shop configuration
settings.upgradePlanDescription: Unlock premium features and increase limits
settings.addcashierDescription: Create cashier accounts for your staff
settings.privacy&securityDescription: Control your data and security settings
settings.help&supportDescription: Get help and contact our support team
settings.cashierListDescription: View and manage your cashier accounts
settings.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the interface

addCashier.title: Add Cashier
addCashier.description: Create credentials for a new cashier user

scanner.title: Scan QR Code
scanner.instructions: Position the QR code within the frame to scan
scanner.instructionsDetail: Make sure the code is clearly visible and well-lit

upgradePlan.title: Upgrade Your Plan
upgradePlan.description: Choose the perfect plan to scale your promotional campaigns and grow your business
upgradePlan.questionsDescription: Our team is here to help you choose the right plan for your business
upgradePlan.footerNote: Cancel anytime. No long-term commitment. Your success drives our roadmap.

helpSupport.title: Help & Support
helpSupport.description: Get help with your Shop-Code account
helpSupport.contactDescription: Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible
helpSupport.subject: Subject
helpSupport.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your issue or question in detail...
helpSupport.messageResponse: We'll respond to your inquiry within 24 hours.
helpSupport.messageFailed: Failed to send message. Please try again.

errors.errorDescription: We encountered an issue while processing. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
errors.pleaseWait: Please wait while we prepare the upload
